statements: SELECT * FROM RoomBookings WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT booking_id, room_id, start_date FROM RoomBookings WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT end_date, start_date, room_id FROM RoomBookings WHERE guest_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM RoomBookings WHERE start_date >= '2022-10-01' AND end_date <= '2022-10-31';
SELECT guest_id, room_id FROM RoomBookings WHERE start_date < '2022-11-15' AND end_date >= '2022-11-20';
SELECT * FROM RoomBookings WHERE guest_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, room_id, start_date FROM RoomBookings WHERE room_id = 3 AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM RoomBookings GROUP BY guest_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT room_id, start_date, end_date FROM RoomBookings WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY room_id, start_date;
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, room_id, start_date, end_date FROM RoomBookings WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM room_bookings;
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings;
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings WHERE room_id = 5;
SELECT guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings WHERE guest_id = 10 AND check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings WHERE booking_id = 10 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_id, room_type, meal_preference FROM guest_preferences WHERE meal_preference = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY guest_id;
SELECT guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings WHERE guest_id = 15 AND check_in_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY check_out_date ASC;
SELECT guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings WHERE room_id = 25 ORDER BY check_in_date ASC, check_out_date DESC;

SELECT guest_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, room_type FROM room_bookings JOIN guest_preferences ON room_bookings.guest_id = guest_preferences.guest_id WHERE room_type = 'Suite' ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM retreat_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM retreat_centers ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT guest_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_bookings WHERE center_id = 1;
SELECT guest_id, preferred_room_type, dietary_restrictions FROM guest_preferences WHERE preferred_room_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT center_name, location FROM retreat_centers WHERE location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT * FROM retreat_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM retreat_centers WHERE location = 'Beach';

SELECT rb.booking_id, rc.center_name, gp.dietary_restrictions FROM room_bookings rb INNER JOIN retreat_centers rc ON rb.center_id = rc.center_id LEFT JOIN guest_preferences gp ON rb.guest_id = gp.guest_id;
SELECT rc.*, rb.room_number FROM retreat_centers rc INNER JOIN room_bookings rb ON rc.center_id = rb.center_id WHERE rb.check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rc.center_name, COUNT(rb.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM retreat_centers rc LEFT JOIN room_bookings rb ON rc.center_id = rb.center_id GROUP BY rc.center_name ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM yoga_retreat_centers;
SELECT center_id, center_name, location FROM yoga_retreat_centers WHERE location = 'Bali';
SELECT center_name, capacity FROM yoga_retreat_centers WHERE capacity >= 20 ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM room_bookings ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT guest_id, room_number, start_date, end_date FROM room_bookings WHERE center_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM yoga_retreat_centers;
SELECT center_name, location FROM yoga_retreat_centers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM yoga_retreat_centers WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM yoga_retreat_centers WHERE center_id = 3;
SELECT center_id, center_name FROM yoga_retreat_centers WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT * FROM room_bookings;
SELECT guest_id, booking_date FROM room_bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT room_number, booking_date FROM room_bookings WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT guest_name, email_address FROM guests WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT preferred_room_type, dietary_restrictions FROM guest_preferences;
SELECT * FROM room_bookings WHERE guest_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM guest_preferences WHERE preferred_room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT guest_name, email_address FROM guests WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT room_number, availability FROM rooms WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT guest_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM guests JOIN payment_records ON guests.guest_id = payment_records.guest_id;
